content.rendered:
Vologda Airport in Vologda, Russia Contact Address, Phone number, Email, Location Map, Website

Vologda Airport in Vologda, Russia

Airport Name : Vologda Airport

ICAO Code :Ulww

IATA Code : Vgd

Address: Vologda Oblast, Russia, 160901

Phone: +7 817 250-77-22

Business hours :

Fax: 8 (8172) 50-77-86

Email:

Map: View direction here

Vologda Airport Website: https://www.avia35.ru/
